consensus-beaconcha-in-desc: Ebe Nlele mepere emepe Eth2 Beacon Chain
consensus-beaconscan-desc: Ebe nlele Eth2 Beacon Chain – Etherscan maka Eth2
consensus-become-staker-desc: Ntinye ego ebidola! Ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ itinye ETH gị iji nyere aka chekwaa netwọkụ ahụ, jide n'aka na ị maara ihe egwu dị na ya.
consensus-run-beacon-chain-desc: Ethereum chọrọ ka ọtụtụ ndị ahịa na-aru ọrụ dị ka o kwere mee. Nyere aka na ihe ọma ọha Ethereum a!
